verses.verse: And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> out of <S%H7851>Shittim<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> to <S%H7270>spy<s%> <S%H2791>secretly<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H3212>Go<s%> <S%H7200>view<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>, even <S%H3405>Jericho<s%>. And they <S%H3212>went<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> into an <S%H2181>harlot's<s%> <S%H802>house<s%> <S%H1004><s%>, <S%H8034>named<s%> <S%H7343>Rahab<s%>, and <S%H7901>lodged<s%> there. sent: or, had sent lodged: Heb. lay

And it was <S%H559>told<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Behold, there <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> in hither to <S%H3915>night<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to search <S%H2658>out<s%> the <S%H776>country<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> unto <S%H7343>Rahab<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> that are <S%H935>come<s%> to thee, which are <S%H935>entered<s%> into thine <S%H1004>house<s%>: for they be <S%H935>come<s%> to search <S%H2658>out<s%> all the <S%H776>country<s%>.

And the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H582>men<s%>, and <S%H6845>hid<s%> them, and <S%H559>said<s%> thus, There <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> unto me, but I <S%H3045>wist<s%> not <S%H370>whence<s%> they were:

And it came to pass about the time of <S%H5462>shutting<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%>, when it was <S%H2822>dark<s%>, that the <S%H582>men<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%>: whither the <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> I <S%H3045>wot<s%> not: <S%H7291>pursue<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them <S%H4118>quickly<s%>; for ye shall <S%H5381>overtake<s%> them.

But she had brought them <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H1406>roof<s%> of the house, and <S%H2934>hid<s%> them with the <S%H6086>stalks<s%> of <S%H6593>flax<s%>, which she had laid in <S%H6186>order<s%> upon the <S%H1406>roof<s%>.

And the <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them the <S%H1870>way<s%> to <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> unto the <S%H4569>fords<s%>: and as soon as they which <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them were gone <S%H3318>out<s%>, they <S%H5462>shut<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%>.
And before they were laid <S%H7901>down<s%>, she came <S%H5927>up<s%> unto them upon the <S%H1406>roof<s%>;

And she <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H582>men<s%>, I <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H5414>given<s%> you the <S%H776>land<s%>, and that your <S%H367>terror<s%> is <S%H5307>fallen<s%> upon us, and that all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H4127>faint<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of you. faint: Heb. melt

For we have <S%H8085>heard<s%> how the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> dried <S%H3001>up<s%> the <S%H4325>water<s%> of the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%> for <S%H6440>you<s%>, when ye came <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>; and what ye <S%H6213>did<s%> unto the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, that were on the other <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> and <S%H5747>Og<s%>, whom ye utterly <S%H2763>destroyed<s%>.

And as soon as we had <S%H8085>heard<s%> these things, our <S%H3824>hearts<s%> did <S%H4549>melt<s%>, neither did there <S%H6965>remain<s%> any more <S%H7307>courage<s%> in any <S%H376>man<s%>, <S%H6440>because<s%> of you: for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, he is <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H8064>heaven<s%> <S%H4605>above<s%>, and in <S%H776>earth<s%> beneath. did there: Heb. rose up

Now therefore, I pray you, <S%H7650>swear<s%> unto me by the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, <S%H3588>since<s%> I have <S%H6213>shewed<s%> you <S%H2617>kindness<s%>, that ye will also <S%H6213>shew<s%> <S%H2617>kindness<s%> unto my <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>, and <S%H5414>give<s%> me a <S%H571>true<s%> <S%H226>token<s%>:

And that ye will save <S%H2421>alive<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%>, and my <S%H517>mother<s%>, and my <S%H251>brethren<s%>, and my <S%H269>sisters<s%>, and all that they have, and <S%H5337>deliver<s%> our <S%H5315>lives<s%> from <S%H4194>death<s%>.

And the <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H559>answered<s%> her, Our <S%H5315>life<s%> for <S%H4191>yours<s%>, if ye <S%H5046>utter<s%> not this our <S%H1697>business<s%>. And it shall be, when the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H5414>given<s%> us the <S%H776>land<s%>, that we will <S%H6213>deal<s%> <S%H2617>kindly<s%> and <S%H571>truly<s%> with thee. for: Heb. instead of you to die

Then she let them <S%H3381>down<s%> by a <S%H2256>cord<s%> <S%H1157>through<s%> the <S%H2474>window<s%>: for her <S%H1004>house<s%> was upon the <S%H7023>town<s%> <S%H2346>wall<s%>, and she <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> upon the <S%H2346>wall<s%>.

And she <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, <S%H3212>Get<s%> you to the <S%H2022>mountain<s%>, lest the <S%H7291>pursuers<s%> <S%H6293>meet<s%> you; and <S%H2247>hide<s%> yourselves there <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, until the <S%H7291>pursuers<s%> be <S%H7725>returned<s%>: and <S%H310>afterward<s%> may ye <S%H3212>go<s%> your <S%H1870>way<s%>.
And the <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto her, We will be <S%H5355>blameless<s%> of this thine <S%H7621>oath<s%> which thou hast made us <S%H7650>swear<s%>.

Behold, when we <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%>, thou shalt <S%H7194>bind<s%> this <S%H8615>line<s%> of <S%H8144>scarlet<s%> <S%H2339>thread<s%> in the <S%H2474>window<s%> which thou didst let us down <S%H3381>by<s%>: and thou shalt <S%H622>bring<s%> thy <S%H1>father<s%>, and thy <S%H517>mother<s%>, and thy <S%H251>brethren<s%>, and all thy <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>household<s%>, <S%H1004>home<s%> unto thee. bring: Heb. gather

And it shall be, that <S%H834>whosoever<s%> shall go <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of thy <S%H1004>house<s%> into the <S%H2351>street<s%>, his <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall be upon his <S%H7218>head<s%>, and we will be <S%H5355>guiltless<s%>: and whosoever shall be with thee in the <S%H1004>house<s%>, his <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall be on our <S%H7218>head<s%>, if any <S%H3027>hand<s%> be upon him.
And if thou <S%H5046>utter<s%> this our <S%H1697>business<s%>, then we will be <S%H5355>quit<s%> of thine <S%H7621>oath<s%> which thou hast made us to <S%H7650>swear<s%>.

And she <S%H559>said<s%>, According unto your <S%H1697>words<s%>, so be it. And she sent them <S%H7971>away<s%>, and they <S%H3212>departed<s%>: and she <S%H7194>bound<s%> the <S%H8144>scarlet<s%> <S%H8615>line<s%> in the <S%H2474>window<s%>.

And they <S%H3212>went<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> unto the <S%H2022>mountain<s%>, and <S%H3427>abode<s%> there <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, until the <S%H7291>pursuers<s%> were <S%H7725>returned<s%>: and the <S%H7291>pursuers<s%> <S%H1245>sought<s%> them throughout all the <S%H1870>way<s%>, but <S%H4672>found<s%> them not.

So the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%>, and <S%H3381>descended<s%> from the <S%H2022>mountain<s%>, and passed <S%H5674>over<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%>, and <S%H5608>told<s%> him all things that <S%H4672>befell<s%> them:

And they <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>, <S%H3588>Truly<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H5414>delivered<s%> into our <S%H3027>hands<s%> all the <S%H776>land<s%>; for even all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>country<s%> do <S%H4127>faint<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of us. faint: Heb. melt
